data.name: Grisaia Phantom Trigger Vol.5.5 Ending Theme Song
data.detailed_description:
Vol.5.5 Ending theme song for Grisaia Phantom Trigger.
The tracks are available in both MP3 and WAV (high-quality) format.


Butterfly Trail

　Vocal: Hana
　Composition & Piano: Oharu
　Lyrics: Yoshikazu Kuwashima

　Mix and Mastering by Hanzo
　Recording: Hanzo
　Recorded at JaM Studio


WAV:44.1kHz 16bit
MP3:192kbps
